title: Conor Gallagher 'still in Chelsea plans' after they reject bid from West Ham
description: Chelsea manager Mauricio Pochettino says Conor Gallagher is still in his plans after the club reject a reported £40m bid from West Ham.

title: Trevor Reed: Ex-US marine freed by Russia is injured fighting in Ukraine
description: After being freed last year in a prisoner exchange with Russia, Trevor Reed is injured in Ukraine.

title: Chancellor has concerns as NatWest boss Dame Alison Rose admits 'serious error'
description: Dame Alison Rose admitted a "serious error" in talking about Nigel Farage's relationship with its private banking arm Coutts.

title: Robin Grainger: Only selling one ticket to my show launched my career
description: The comedian who brought a whole new meaning to the term "one-man show" is returning to the Edinburgh Fringe.

title: Brussels bombers found guilty after long murder trial
description: Six of the 10 suspects are convicted of terrorist murder for the twin bombings that killed 32 people.

title: Tour de France Femmes 2023: Lorena Wiebes beats Marianne Vos in sprint finish on stage three
description: Lorena Wiebes wins stage three of the Tour de France Femmes as breakaway rider Julie Van De Velde is caught with about 200m to go.

title: Greece fires: Two pilots die after firefighting plane crashes

description: Dame Alison Rose said she was "wrong" to respond to questions from the BBC about his bank account being closed.

title: Ukraine war: Russia expands pool of men eligible for call-up

title: Rare Apple computer trainers on sale for $50,000

description: Connor Gibson has been convicted of sexually assaulting and killing his 16-year-old sister in 2021.

title: Women's World Cup: Can Republic of Ireland, a 'horrible team to play against', cause a shock?

title: Just Stop Oil protests cost Met Police £7.7m since April

title: Leicester: Man and five-year-old boy found dead in house

description: It's this summer's headline transfer saga, but after a world record bid, where will Kylian Mbappe end up?

title: Labour drops pledge to introduce self-ID for trans people

title: Qin Gang: China removes foreign minister months after appointment

title: World Aquatics Championships 2023: GB's Matt Richards and Tom Dean win 200m freestyle gold and silver
description: Matt Richards and Tom Dean win 200m freestyle gold and silver to secure Great Britain's first medals of the World Aquatics Championships in Japan.

title: Marmite maker Unilever's sales soar after hiking prices

title: Obamas' chef Tafari Campbell dies in paddleboarding accident

title: Paris to bring back swimming in Seine after 100 years
